bibl.seg: David Peacock & Lucy Blue (edd.), assisted by Julian Whitewright, Myos Hormos - Quseir al-Qadim. Roman and Islamic Ports on the Red Sea. Volume 2: The Finds from the Excavations 1999-2003 = University of Southampton. Series in Archaeology. 6 = BAR International Series. 2286.
